title: What is the point of this level system on the boards?
body: Forgive but I'm newish here and this just makes no sense to me that I have to level up somehow to use the boards, but wait I can't respond to anyone or even upvote anything, how does this work? please explain.

replies.body: Your Boards level is directly tied to your in client Summoner Level. The main goal is to prevent people from making constant smurfs in order to upvote themselves or bully others.
Right on it was weird because I am summoner level 30, but it just wasn't letting me do anything and was telling me I need to be level 7 etc etc.
